products.title: Linear Pumice Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Crisp, smart and stylish, this chic blind features some subtle but beautiful detailing. The grey tone comes from the brown and cream pinstripes across the slats, making for a mixed look thats at once earthy and warm, and cleanly modern. Designed to be effortlessly fitted in crisp, smart and stylish, this chic blind features some subtle but beautiful detailing.

products.title: Linear Pumice Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Here the linear pumice venetian blind features narrow hand-drawn pin stripes in cream and soft brown; the colours combine to give a grey pumice shade with a cool and relaxed feel.

products.title: Linear Stucco Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Designed to fit effortlessly into upvc windows and doors, this stunning blind offers effortless fitting and an integrated look thats super smart. Theres more crisp smartness in the finish, a sharp pinstripe in light and dark shades of brown that makes for a warm, earthy vibe designed to fit effortlessly into upvc windows and doors, this stunning blind offers effortless fitting and an integrated look thats super smart.

products.title: Linear Stucco Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Giving the impression of a ridged fabric, this textured design features slightly wavy vertical stripes in two separate shades of brown.
